mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH FROM ROOM A INNER JOIN ROOMTYPE B ON A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE LEFT JOIN BOOKING C ON A.ROOMCODE = C.ROOMCODE WHERE C.ROOMCODE IS NULL ORDER BY A.ROOMCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING1 SELECT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH FROM ROOM A, ROOMTYPE B, BOOKING C WHERE A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE AND B.NAME=#{param1} AND A.ROOMCODE != C.ROOMCODE ORDER BY A.ROOMCODE
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROOMCODE, A.NAME ROOMNAME, B.NAME TYPENAME, A.TYPE, A.HOWMANY, A.HOWMUCH, C.BOOKCODE, C.PERSON, C.CHECKIN, C.CHECKOUT, C.NAME, C.MOBILE FROM ROOM A, ROOMTYPE B, BOOKING C WHERE A.TYPE = B.TYPECODE AND A.ROOMCODE = C.ROOMCODE ORDER BY C.BOOKCODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING(BOOKCODE, ROOMCODE, PERSON, CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, NAME, MOBILE) VALUES(SEQ_BOOK.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5}, #{param6})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKING SET PERSON=#{param2}, CHECKIN=#{param3}, CHECKOUT=#{param4}, NAME=#{param5}, MOBILE=#{param6} WHERE ROOMCODE=#{param1}
